title: War with the Ammonites and Syrians
summary: David sends messengers to show kindness to Hanun, the new king of Ammon, but they are humiliated. This leads to war. Israel defeats both the Ammonites and their Syrian allies in a major battle.

faq.question: Why did war break out with the Ammonites?
faq.answer: Because they humiliated Davidâ€™s ambassadors, suspecting a spy plot.

faq.question: How did Israel win the battle?
faq.answer: Joab led the army against both fronts, and God gave them victory.
